description: This is a React component for a login page, allowing user authentication via a form that captures username and password, utilizing React hooks and context for authentication logic.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form, managing form state, handling input changes, and submitting login requests using context.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Handles input change events; updates the form state with current input values.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission; prevents default submission and calls the login method from context with username and password.
